title: Share Management
publishNote: Publishing to market allows anyone to find this deck.
linkShareInfo: Share this link to give access to the deck.

copy.label: Copy
copy.detail: All card operations possible. Cards, add/edit/delete included. Fully independent from the original.

subscribe.label: Subscribe
subscribe.desc: Synced with original, study progress is separate.
subscribe.detail: When I add cards, subscribers also get them. Card editing is not allowed. Study progress is tracked individually.

snapshot.label: Snapshot
snapshot.detail: Copy current cards exactly, but editing is not allowed. A one-time snapshot of the deck.
